column5: Announced at noon, still raining in Daytona, rain should end around 3 PM, track drying to begin around 3PM, Race at 7:00 PM Eastern , To-day, on Fox.  Regards, Snowball
Boogity boogity boogity less go racin at 7.00pm boys and girls,
Under the lights!  Should be a good time if they can get the track dried up!

I have a friend at the track  sun was out around 3 but its raining again...They announced it will take a minimum of 3 hours to dry things up.over a foot of water at the entrance to pit road. So it has to stop raining now and not rain again...Not looking good...Still calling for 80% of scattered thunderstorms until 6 pm..I think there is a zoning bylaw in regard to noise, but I'm sure it has to be done by midnight..
If nascar thinks it can get half a race in,they will do it. SHAME
Clearing up just nice now.See some blue patches.
